arts.ttl: Vinicius Junior red card: How many matches will Real Madrid superstar miss?
arts.sum: Real Madrid could reportedly be without Vinicius Junior for their next four matches following the red card that he was handed against Valencia in La Liga.

arts.ttl: Player Ratings: Valencia 1 - 2 Real Madrid; 2025 La Liga
arts.sum: Jude Bellingham—9: The leader of this team — Jude Bellingham has been the team’s best player all season and stepped up tonight with an assist and a game-winning goal in the 95th minute. Made a total of four saves in the match, with Valencia producing eight shots on the night.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid achieve winning feat for first time this century in dramatic late Valencia fightback
arts.sum: Real Madrid achieve a winning feat for the first time in the 21st century with their late fightback in Friday's 2-1 away win over Valencia.

arts.ttl: Modrić scores a historic goal at the Mestalla "Breaking records is always nice"
arts.sum: In his 561st game for Real Madrid, the Croatian achieved this milestone and equalled the record of two Real Madrid legends, Pirri and Míchel. At the end of the game, the Croatian spoke to RealmadridTV and was happy to have achieved these milestones: “Breaking records is always nice.

arts.ttl: How many games will Vinicius Jr be suspended for after his red card against Valencia?
arts.sum: After reviewing the incident on the pitchside monitor, Soto Grado showed Vinícius a straight red card, marking the Brazilian’s first dismissal in seven years of La Liga play. Vinícius now faces a potential suspension of up to four games, depending on the referee’s official report.

arts.ttl: Jude Bellingham seals comeback win for 10-man Real Madrid over Valencia
arts.sum: Late strikes from Luka Modric and Jude Bellingham earned 10-man Real Madrid a 2-1 comeback win at relegation-threatened Valencia on Friday as the visitors moved top of La Liga. Real had to fight back after Hugo Duro put Valencia ahead in the 27th minute by tapping into an open goal after Thibaut Courtois had blocked Javi Guerra’s first close-range effort. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Real Madrid fans send demand to Carlo Ancelotti after win over Valencia
arts.sum: Supporters of La Liga giants Real Madrid have taken to social media this evening, to send something of a demand to head coach Carlo Ancelotti. This comes fresh off another…

arts.ttl: Ancelotti: “Real Madrid will appeal Vinícius’ red card”
arts.sum: Ancelotti also answered a question from Lucas Navarrete of Managing Madrid, who asked the coach about Eduardo Camavinga’s impact on the game off the bench at left-back. Following the dramatic and thrilling 2-1 win over Valencia at Mestalla, Real Madrid coach Carlo Ancelotti spoke to the media about the events of Friday night, including the red card for Vinícius Júnior, on which the Italian said, “What we thought was that it wasn’t a red card, it was two yellow cards.

arts.ttl: 2 key Real Madrid stars set to miss Las Palmas clash
arts.sum: La Liga giants Real Madrid are set to be without the services of two star members of the club’s squad, for their upcoming meeting with Las Palmas. This comes owing…

arts.ttl: Arne Slot claims Trent Alexander-Arnold transfer speculation 'can HELP' Liverpool's Premier League title bid with England star linked with Real Madrid switch
arts.sum: LEWIS STEELE: It is understood Liverpool have not yet received any official bids for Alexander-Arnold but sources in Spain say Real are extremely confident of tempting him to join.
